article_title: Oprah Winfrey -- You're Paying Too Much For My Old Crap
article_text:
Oprah Winfrey You're Paying Too Much ... For My Old Crap

Exclusive Video

You paid too much! And you paid too much! Everybody paid too much for's old junk at her estate sale today ... and the Big O was shocked.Oprah and BFFwere front and center during the auction Saturday in Santa Barbara ... where she was selling stuff off for her Leadership Academy in South Africa.The first item was a poster (pictured below) from "" that Winfrey proudly displayed in her office for a long time -- the starting bid was $2k ... and Oprah was blown away by the price.The poster eventually sold for $4k --but you have to see O's reaction as the bids went up, and up, and up ...It's priceless.
